_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

OrderResponseSimple.description: A document used to indicate simple acceptance or rejection of an entire Order.

OrderResponseSimple.title: Order Response Simple. Details
OrderResponseSimple.description: A document used to indicate simple acceptance or rejection of an entire Order.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Order Response Simple. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Order Response Simple. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Order Response Simple. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Order Response Simple. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Order Response Simple. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Order Response Simple. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Order Response Simple. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Order Response Simple. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Order Response Simple. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Order Response Simple. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

AcceptedIndicator.title: Order Response Simple. Accepted_ Indicator. Indicator
AcceptedIndicator.description: Indicates whether the Order is accepted (true) or rejected (false).

RejectionNote.title: Order Response Simple. Rejection_ Note. Text
RejectionNote.description: The reason for rejection if the order was not accepted.

CustomerReference.title: Order Response Simple. Customer_ Reference. Text
CustomerReference.description: A supplementary reference for the transaction (e.g., when using a purchasing card).

AccountingCostCode.title: Order Response Simple. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: An accounting cost code applied to the order as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Order Response Simple. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: An accounting cost code applied to the order as a whole, expressed as text.

OrderReference.title: Order Response Simple. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to the Order being responded to.

OrderChangeDocumentReference.title: Order Response Simple. Order Change_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OrderChangeDocumentReference.description: A reference to an Order Change being responded to.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Order Response Simple. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Order Response Simple. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Order Response Simple. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Order Response Simple. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Order Response Simple. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Order Response Simple. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Order Response Simple. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party
